Question: On 30 May 1498, this person left with six ships from Sanlúcar, Spain, for his third trip to the New World.
Hints: Veneration of this person in America dates back to colonial times.
This person called the island (in what is now The Bahamas) San Salvador; the natives called it Guanahani.
The location of the Dominican remains is in "The ____ Lighthouse" (Faro a Colón), in Santo Domingo.
